# Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF)
Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) provides centralized protection to your web applications from common web exploits and vulnerabilities such as SQL injection, and cross-site scripting. Azure WAF provides out-of-the-box protection from OWASP top 10 vulnerabilities via managed rules.

![Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF).](../images/azure-web-application-firewall.png)

When to use Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF):

- To prevent attacks in application code.
- Centrally manage security for applications.
- Deploy WAF with Azure Application Gateway, Azure Front Door, and Azure Content Delivery Network (CDN).
